name: Rainfall: Race of the drops!
description:
Rain is a beautiful, relaxing natural phenomena... Or is it? 

Secretly, raindrops meet up above to partake in an epic race against each other!

When the thunder comes, it heralds another Rainfall: Race of the Drops!

Race along the skies while evading obstacles, getting bonuses and raking up points.

Get a high-score and publish it in the online leaderboard for bragging rights!

The downloadable versions are identical to the web version, and are provided for convenience (better performance, offline play, etc).

As requested by the GameJam rules, here are the third party assets used:

Rain loop: https://freesound.org/people/aesqe/sounds/37618/

Long wind gust: https://freesound.org/people/Tony%20B%20kksm/sounds/80937/

Short wind gust: https://freesound.org/people/crashoverride6/sounds/146932/

Short wind gust 2: https://freesound.org/people/NIKOKnecht/sounds/569109/

Thunder: https://freesound.org/people/Josh74000MC/sounds/477840/ 

Thunder 2: https://freesound.org/people/netaj/sounds/193170/

Thunder 3: https://freesound.org/people/Nimlos/sounds/359151/

Snow texture pack: https://3dtextures.me/2018/03/01/snow-003/

Thump sound: https://freesound.org/people/DigestContent/sounds/458877/

Splash sound: https://freesound.org/people/rombart/sounds/186748/

Splash sound 2: https://freesound.org/people/swordofkings128/sounds/398032/

Splash sound 3: https://freesound.org/people/hello_flowers/sounds/32073/
